name: fmt::FormattingOptions::align

option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 4821, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 25973, name: "fmt::Alignment" }), GenericArgs([]))) })])

doc:
Sets or removes the alignment.

 The alignment specifies how the value being formatted should be
 positioned if it is smaller than the width of the formatter.
